lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Now I am [type:adjective, eng:normal, jpn:普通 ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Now I am [type:adjective, eng:happy, jpn:嬉しい ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Now I am [type:adjective, eng:sad, jpn:悲しい ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Now I am [type:adjective, eng:surprised, jpn:びっくりされた ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Now I am [type:adjective, eng:thinking, jpn:考えている ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: [type:pronoun, eng:I, jpn:私] [type:adverb, eng:really, jpn:本当に] [type:verb, eng:like, jpn:好き] [type:noun, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: [type:interjection, eng:Wow, jpn:わあ]! That [type:noun, eng:kitchen, jpn:台所] looks [type:adjective, eng:clean, jpn:きれい]!

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: [type:phrase, eng:By the way, jpn:ところで], did you [type:verb, eng:see, jpn:見た] [type:pronoun, eng:my, jpn:私の] [type:noun, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ]?
